meanings.sent1: The nonmunicipal park was privately owned and not managed by the city.
meanings.sent2: The nonmunicipal building was located outside the city limits.
meanings.sent3: The nonmunicipal playground had no rules, making it a wild and fun place for kids.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmunicipal attitude towards authority made her stand out in the community.
meanings.sent5: The nonmunicipal garden was a hidden gem, away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

meanings.definition: Not under the jurisdiction of a municipality.
meanings.sent1: The nonmunicipal land was governed by its own set of rules.
meanings.sent2: The nonmunicipal business operated independently from city regulations.
meanings.sent3: Living in a nonmunicipal area meant you had to handle your own trash collection.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a nonmunicipal territory, free from external influence.
meanings.sent5: The nonmunicipal zone was a haven for those seeking autonomy from city laws.
